frontend/app/globals.css.description: Added .focus-ring utility class in @layer utilities that provides consistent focus-visible styling: outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-blue-500 dark:focus-visible:ring-blue-400 focus-visible:ring-offset-2. Use this class on all interactive elements for WCAG 2.1 Level AA keyboard accessibility compliance.

frontend/components/FilterPanel.tsx.description: FilterPanel contains multiple interactive elements: mobile filter button, QuickFilterChip component, FilterSection component with toggle, evidence level buttons. Select elements already have focus:ring-2 styling but buttons do not.

frontend/components/Header.tsx.description: ViewTab component now has focus-ring class for keyboard accessibility. Added rounded-md to ensure focus ring matches the button's visual shape (matching the motion.div active indicator).

frontend/components/ThemeToggle.tsx.description: ThemeToggle has two buttons: a placeholder button shown during SSR/hydration and the main interactive button. Both need focus-ring class for consistent keyboard accessibility.

frontend/components/Filters.tsx.description: Filters.tsx contains view toggle buttons (Map, List, Analytics) that now have focus-ring class for keyboard accessibility. The buttons are contained in a flex container with rounded-lg styling. Select elements for filters already have focus:ring-2 styling.
